EmailTemplate.name: Notice To Users
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Salesforce Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!User.Name}
As a reminder, we will be shutting down both instances of Salesforce today, January 10, 2019, at 6 PM CST. Any updates made after this time will not be migrated to the new system.
Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
Thank you,
Mike
Mike Lippman
Vice President, Sales Operations
R1 RCM Inc. | mlippman@r1rcm.com | Tele: +1 513 252 4898
401 N Michigan Ave., Suite 2700 | Chicago, IL 60611
